channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: St george flag on lamp post, 11th November
item.description:
Flag is on lamp post on public green space. Flag being utilised as in offensive political symbol. Unacceptable to leave these on public property as encourages the lazy acceptance of hate graffiti.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmerside Road, Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Filthy Roads, 11th November
item.description:
Rubbish is littered and items dumped along the street, yet again Ceres Road at the junction to Kashgar. The whole of Ceres Road needs to be cleaned, leaves blocking pavement walkway mixed with litter. Ceres Road has not been cleaned for months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ceres Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping of loads of rubbish in the old Leather Bottle site in Heron Hill, 11th November
item.description:
Flytipping of loads of rubbish in the old Leather Bottle site in Heron Hill, people are using it as a dumping ground and there have been sites of rats around so not sure whether council are able to do anything about this or whether they can get onto the owner to get this sorted out or a fence put up to try stop this from keep happening - please can this be looked into
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Heron Hill, Lessness Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Between Dobson Close and Tube Station entrance, 11th November
item.description:
The wall and gate giving entry to the Harben estate has been seriosly vandalised. The wall is broken down deliberately, the gate loosened or removed and the area is now a flytipping location. This area has been repeatedly vandalised in recent years and apart from repair it needs cctv installed to identify the people resposible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Belsize Road, Belsize Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet
